changeSet.author: vgaikwad
changeSet.id: Added regular expressions for date formats dd-mm-yyyy and dd-mmm-yyyy to deidentify dates in spr report
changeSet.sql:
insert into catissue_deidentified_text (string_content, delete_line, delete_next_line) values ("\\d{1,2}/\\d{1,2}/\\d{4} \\d{4}\\b", 0, 0);
insert into catissue_deidentified_text (string_content, delete_line, delete_next_line) values ("\\b\\d{1,2}-[a-zA-Z]{3}-\\d{4}", 0, 0);

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: update catissue_specimen_coll_group set REASON_FOR_MISSED_CASE = 'No post ops consent taken within 3 months' where collection_status = 'Not Collected-No post ops consent taken within three months'
update catissue_specimen_coll_group set REASON_FOR_MISSED_CASE = 'No post ops consent taken within 3 months' where REASON_FOR_MISSED_CASE = 'No Post Ops consent taken within 3 mths'
update catissue_specimen_coll_group set MISSED_REASON = REASON_FOR_MISSED_CASE
update catissue_specimen_coll_group set COLLECTION_STATUS = 'Complete' where COLLECTION_STATUS = 'Complete-Late'
update catissue_specimen_coll_group set COLLECTION_STATUS = 'Missed Collection' where COLLECTION_STATUS not in ('Pending', 'Complete')

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Reset TRID counter in key sequence table
changeSet.sql:
select MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(name, 2, length(name)) AS UNSIGNED)) from catissue_specimen_coll_group where name like 'z%' into @TRID_FLAG;
insert into key_seq_generator (identifier, key_value, key_sequence_id, key_type) values (default, 'SGH', @TRID_FLAG ,'TRID');

changeSet.id: Updating initial quantity to non-zero in specimen requirements

changeSet.author: hemant
changeSet.id: Updating collection event table from scg event
changeSet.sql: update catissue_coll_event_param cscep inner join catissue_specimen cs on cs.identifier=cscep.specimen_id inner join catissue_specimen_coll_group scg on cs.specimen_collection_group_id=scg.identifier set cscep.user_id=scg.collector_id, cscep.container=scg.collection_container, cscep.collection_procedure=scg.collection_procedure, cscep.comments=scg.collection_comments, cscep.event_timestamp=scg.collection_timestamp where cs.collection_status='Collected' and cs.lineage='New' and cs.activity_status != 'Disabled' and scg.collection_container != 'Use CP Defaults' and scg.collection_procedure != 'Use CP Defaults';

changeSet.author: hemant
changeSet.id: Updating received event table from scg event
changeSet.sql: update catissue_received_event_param crep inner join catissue_specimen cs on cs.identifier=crep.specimen_id inner join catissue_specimen_coll_group scg on cs.specimen_collection_group_id=scg.identifier set crep.user_id=scg.receiver_id, crep.comments=scg.received_comments, crep.event_timestamp=scg.received_timestamp, crep.received_quality=scg.received_quality where cs.collection_status='Collected' and cs.lineage='New' and cs.activity_status != 'Disabled' and scg.received_quality != 'Use CP Defaults';

changeSet.author: hemant
changeSet.id: Updating container column of collection event table
changeSet.sql: update catissue_coll_event_param cscep inner join catissue_specimen cs on cs.identifier=cscep.specimen_id inner join catissue_cp_req_specimen as ccrs on ccrs.identifier= cs.req_specimen_id join catissue_specimen_coll_group scg on cs.specimen_collection_group_id=scg.identifier set cscep.container=ccrs.collection_container where cs.collection_status='Collected' and cs.lineage='New' and cs.activity_status != 'Disabled' and scg.collection_container='Use CP Defaults';

changeSet.author: hemant
changeSet.id: Updating collection procedure column of collection event table
changeSet.sql: update catissue_coll_event_param cscep inner join catissue_specimen cs on cs.identifier=cscep.specimen_id inner join catissue_cp_req_specimen as ccrs on ccrs.identifier= cs.req_specimen_id join catissue_specimen_coll_group scg on cs.specimen_collection_group_id=scg.identifier set cscep.collection_procedure=ccrs.collection_procedure where cs.collection_status='Collected' and cs.lineage='New' and cs.activity_status != 'Disabled' and scg.collection_procedure='Use CP Defaults';

changeSet.author: hemant
changeSet.id: Updating received quality column of received event table
changeSet.sql: update catissue_received_event_param crep inner join catissue_specimen cs on cs.identifier=crep.specimen_id inner join catissue_cp_req_specimen as ccrs on ccrs.identifier= cs.req_specimen_id join catissue_specimen_coll_group scg on cs.specimen_collection_group_id=scg.identifier set crep.received_quality=ccrs.received_quality where cs.collection_status='Collected' and cs.lineage='New' and cs.activity_status != 'Disabled' and scg.received_quality='Use CP Defaults';
